definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
suffix of a noun of locality
fine paper made from bamboo, used for calligraphy, painting etc/also written 毛邊|毛边[mao2 bian1]

sentences.english: Snowflakes clung to his eyebrows and to the fur trim of his jacket and cap.
sentences.chinese: 眉毛上挂着雪花，茄克的毛边和帽子上都是雪。

sentences.english: It is not allowed to have hairy, lack angles, slide cutting on the edge of the.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子的外露部位，不允许有毛边，缺角，滑刀等现象。

sentences.english: All you want is enough chopped off to make it squared off and straight.
sentences.chinese: 你需要的只是把毛边切掉，使之成为平整的四方形。

sentences.english: The rough edges should lap under.
sentences.chinese: 毛边应该向下折叠进去。

sentences.english: First, I removed the rough edges of the paper so I could measured it easily.
sentences.chinese: 先裁去纸的毛边，以方便测量。

sentences.english: These ancient books are printed on paper with deckled edges, and are of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 这些古籍都是用毛边印刷的，质地不怎么好。

sentences.english: Parts of hard material or with harden treatment can be de- burred and bevel angle easily.
sentences.chinese: 硬材质或热处理后之工件都可轻易去除毛边或倒角。

sentences.english: Use the reaming blade on the end of the tube cutter to remove any burrs
sentences.chinese: 用截管器尾部的铰刀清除毛边。

sentences.english: The crimp shall be generally symmetrical with minimal burrs .
sentences.chinese: 通常卷边应于最少毛边对称。

sentences.english: Therefore, ensure that only the use of farm-raised and rough edges of the paper.
sentences.chinese: 因此，确保只使用没有凸起和毛边的纸张。

sentences.english: Raw edge at corner of pocket not turned under points on pointed flap design.
sentences.chinese: 在袋盖的设计上，没有将口袋角的毛边折缝进去。
